articles.title: Snackbox Service
articles.summary: Order snackboxes for meetings and events
articles.content: Our snackbox service provides convenient catering options for meetings, training sessions, and events. Each snackbox includes a selection of sandwiches, snacks, fruit, and beverages. Choose from vegetarian, vegan, and standard options. Minimum order of 5 boxes required. Please order at least 24 hours in advance.

articles.title: Lite Bites (All-Day Menu)
articles.summary: Order meals from the All Day Menu for patients, and sometimes for visitors
